What Sparks a Sense of Belonging?

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1655&user=10620> 	

We often speak about diversity, equity, and inclusion, all of which are the foundation of a stronger, more connected workplace. While diversity brings different perspectives, equity ensures fairness, and inclusion creates space, belonging is the feeling that ties it all together. Itâ€™s the comfort of being yourself. The reassurance that you are seen, heard, and valued; not just for what you do, but for who you are.
Read more here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1655&user=10620>  about how we nurture a culture of Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging.

Plastic free July

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1660&user=10620> 	

Week 4: Reimagine Waste Challenge
Create something artistic or useful from plastic waste or leftover materials and post it here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1660&user=10620> .

Bonus points if you tag a colleague and challenge them to join in! Kids can join too. 

The most creative entry wins a prize!
